name: SilverJD in the Town of Terror
name_original: SilverJD in the Town of Terror
description:
____________________________________________________________________________
WELCOME TO THE TOWN! STAY A WHILE!
____________________________________________________________________________

The town of Tourer. A quaint little town hidden in the of deepest backroads. This humble piece of land offers a chance to start over, thrive, or just settle down! Take a walk around town, and make sure you stop on by the NEW Tourer Laboratory, donated graciously the great benefactor, Dr. Jayson Hart! When you're ready to call it for a night, head on down to the Housing Block where you'll find a hydroelectric supported living quarters, beautiful, serene, and most of all comfortable. Wherever you end up, you'll be sure to have a shock around every corner! We  hope to testsee you soon.

____________________________________________________________________________

Take on the horrors, solve puzzles, uncover mysteries within the town, and save your souls while controlling Silver and his cute pup Jackson in this retro style RPG.

____________________________________________________________________________
____________________________________________________________________________
Silver:

 
____________________________________________________________________________

Passive ability: Critical Striker - Manages to find weak-spots and takes advantage granting him more critical hits than normal!

Strengths: Based around raw damage/boosting critical abilities, Silver proves his strength to be reliable!

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Jackson:
 
____________________________________________________________________________

Passive ability: Auto-Retaliation - Has a chance to counter attack any enemy who targets Jackson. Will nullify damage done to Jackson, but do normal damage to the enemy.

Strengths: Set-ups and speed, this pup moves quick, but can shut down enemies quicker! Use abilities to buff the pup up, or debuff the enemies. A strong member who will turn the tides if used correctly.

_______________________________________________________________________________________


                                                                              FEATURES:

                                                            - Active Turn Based Combat -

                                                   - Original Character Design and Story -

                                              - A Unique and Mysterious Town to Explore -

                                                       - Puzzles to Solve, and Loot to find - 

                                                                 - Tons of Skills to Learn -

                                                              - Achievements/Challenges -

                                                             - Training With the "Master" -

                                                                - Three Different Endings -

                                                                     - ...and Much More! -
_______________________________________________________________________________________

KEYBOARD:
Use the Arrow Keys to move, use Z for the OK button, and X for the CANCEL button, X serves as the MENU button as well. Access the Achievement Menu by pressing Page Up.

To Skip Dialogue (When available), hold down the SHIFT key in-between textboxes. Use Q and W to navigate between menus faster too!

MOUSE:
Control the game "MOSTLY" with mouse! Simply click where you want to go, to advance text, who to attack, what to use, what to interact with, and access the menu using the button in the top right hand of the screen.

GAMEPAD XBOX:

Use D-Pad to move, Use A button for OK, Use B button for Cancel, use Y button for MENU.  Access the Achievement Menu by pressing LB. 

To Skip Dialogue (When available), hold down the X key in-between textboxes. Use LB and RB to navigate between Menus faster too!

GAMEPAD PlayStation:

Use the D-Pad to move, Use X button for OK, use CIRCLE button for CANCEL, use TRIANGLE button for MENU.  Access the Achievement Menu by pressing L1. 

To Skip Dialogue (When available), hold down the SQUARE key in-between textboxes. Use L1 and R1 to navigate between Menus faster too!

 (May require input mapping with the use of a third party application)

_____________________________________________________________________________

Toggle FULLSCREEN with F4.  *Warning game was developed for full screen, there could be potential issues with images or other graphical bugs if you don't use the normal resolutions!*
